question:
A developer chooses to avoid using SingleThreadModel but wants to ensure that data is updated
in a thread-safe manner. Which two can support this design goal? (Choose two.)

options.A: Store the data in a local variable.
options.B: Store the data in an instance variable.
options.C: Store the data in the HttpSession object.
options.D: Store the data in the ServletContext object.
options.E: Store the data in the ServletRequest object.
